titleInfo.title: The Bolshoi Ballet at the Belmont Art Theatre

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and blue on white) hatch poster for a performance of the Bolshoi Ballet staring Galina Ulanova on September 25th at the Belmont Theatre's grand opening. Poster states that the event will be filmed in Eastman color and have continuous performances from 3-11 PM on Friday and Saturday.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
